desc: I have a MySQL database that stores contacts.  I need an iPhone App that will sync contacts in my database to an app on my iPhone that allows easy access to the contact information.The App should sync both ways: If i update a contact on my device, it should be synced back to the MySQL database, and also if it is updated on my website in the database, it should be synced down to the device (maybe an automatic sync when the device is opened).The App will only be used for a few users at my small company, therefore I believe it does not need to be launched into the App Store.I already have the databases set up with data in them.  I use a table to store username and password information for users who have access to the contact information, and this login should be implemented into the app.
title: iPhone App to Sync Contacts from MySQL Database

desc: Ostendo Solutions is looking for a self-motivated and collaboration focused candidate to design, build, support, and maintain mobile applications leveraging Microsoft PowerApps. We are a consulting firm who contracts exclusively to Microsoft Corporation. This is a remote position, relocation is not required, and is a great way to get your foot into the door and experience the Microsoft culture. This is a contract position for a minimum of two months and the ideal candidate must be able to start as soon as possible.Requirements:- Need to be familiar with and understand Microsoft PowerApps- Needs to know APIs and how to integrate into back-end systems- Previous experience with Microsoft applications or work/internship highly preferred- Proven experience as a Web Developer or equivalent background- Experience in web design and programming- Knowledge of UI, browser compatibility, web functions and standards.- Experience with relational database systems, object oriented programming, web application development and search engine optimization- Excellent organizational, planning and time management skills- Advanced attention to detail and problem solving skills- Solid communication skills (written and verbal)- BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalentResponsibilities- Design, develop, code, test, and debug mobile applications- Write well designed, testable, efficient code.- Maintain, expand, and scale websites as needed.- Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices.- Coordinate with web designers to match visual design intent.- Design, code and debug applications in various software languages.- Integrate data from various back-end services and databases.- Evaluate and identify new technologies for implementation.- Create unit test plans/case, develop, unit test, conduct code and unit test walk-throughs- Work with users to define existing or new system scope and objectives- App support and maintenance after launch
title: Microsoft PowerApps Developer

desc: I need a PoC for a cross-platform VOIP app, with the following features:1. Allows users to login using their LinkedIn or there Google accounts2. Allows a logged-in user to see all other logged-in users3. Allows users to establish a VOIP call with any other online userTechnical details:1. Should work on both Android and iPhone2. A server-less solution is OK (no need to spend time on writing server side code), but I need to know in advance the monthly fees I'll have to pay to run the solution3. Usage of 3rd party VOIP providers is OK, but again I need to know the costs in advance4. Clean/clear code is very important... Also I'll need a documentation on how to build and run the code is my environmentPlease bare in mind when bidding that this project is mainly about finding good existing APIs, and integrating them in a cross-platform application, so it's really simple if you know what you're doing

Journal: Is where the keep a legal record of date time and location of signing with a captured Signature Photo and ID from Android or IOS app once captured it cannot be edited as it is a legal recordA dashboard view of their scheduled and completed jobs and invoice status well as the ability to integrate with (see screen capture B) Google and IOS calendarsApp Functionality•	to scan a USA Driver’s License barcode and or capture photo•	ability to capture signature from mobile phone touch screen and GPS coordinates of the time of signing and store on a cloud drive and save show up in CRM under Journal tab as a record of Signing date time and locationAndroid app  and IOS apps fully functionalI would like to discuss further if this is something you can help me put together.

desc: I would like to receive a quotation for an iOs and Android native App Synchronizing with PrestaShop Store.Below, some of the required features:- Automatic Synchronization with my online Store (PrestaShop). All data on the app needs to be downloaded and uploaded from/to the online store: Products Categories, Products, Customer informations (Login, Products on Cart, Buying products, etc),- Easy app modifications: Color, Logo, Fonts, etc.- App Layout:- > Sidebar with: Login, Logout, Customer Photo, Customer informations, Customer Cart;- > On login/signup: Google, Facebook, Button asking customer to receive emails from the store; Register customer information on PrestaShop Store;- > Home: Search tool on the top, with filtering feature, Main banner of the store, Category selection, List of products the selected category;- > Geolocalization Page: Geolocalization tool on Another page, showing the products nearby. On the same page, products on the map should be visualized below the map;- > Region Filtering (appearing in all pages);- > List of customer liked products (appearing in all pages);- > Push notifications from the store emails;- Overall features:- > The code should have simple writing and useful comments (English or Portuguese), so it will be easy for other developer maintain the system;- > All information used on the app, should have full synchronization with the PrestaShop Store (Downloads and Uploads);- > All texts should be of easy modification. This app will run in Brazil, so we will translate everything to portuguese.
title: iOs and Android native App Synchronizing with PrestaShop Store - 16/11/2017 14:26 EST

desc: Very easy project.  Similar to some apps already.  Need the ability for a user to create a unique business card.  Basically how it would work, user selects the template.  Upload stock image, phone gallery image or camera image to the template.  User then selects another template (which is the back side of the first template) and enters contact info.  This could be via fill in forms or by text box pop up.  User previews both the front and back of their design and then saves.  User can buy design and if so, checks out to pay.  Design is set to our printing company and we print the card and mails it to the User.The template has to be printer ready so that we can download the design and send directly to the printer without have to fuss with the design.  We may also need to print out a copy of the sales order which would be included with the card being sent to the user.There are other details but the above is the basics.  This app would be available for both apple and android.Please quote cost to design as you understand this project.  Please provide examples of apps you have done, especially those that might be related.  Any spam will be flagged.  If you are sending app examples be prepared to back up any claim that you are the developer of that app.Thanks,Scott11/16/2017 at 11:35 MST - Additional information submittedPLEASE READ - this is for a mobile phone application not a logo/graphic job!
title: Write an Android application
